name: Financial Flexibility
title: Strong Financial Services Sector
description: In 2024, Cambodia achieved an impressive score of 86.03 in the Financial Services sector, indicating robust financial infrastructure and services.

name: Debt Management Mastery
title: Effective Debt Policy
description: Cambodia's CPIA debt policy rating stood at 5 in 2023, showcasing a strong framework for managing national debt effectively.

name: Empowered Women
title: High Female Decision-Making Participation
description: In 2022, 87.8% of Cambodian women aged 15-49 participated in key decision-making areas, reflecting significant gender empowerment.

name: Tech Manufacturing Challenge
title: Low Tech Manufacturing Contribution
description: In 2022, medium and high-tech manufacturing contributed only 0.26% to Cambodia's manufacturing value added, indicating room for growth in this sector.

name: Water Investment Woes
title: Limited Investment in Water and Sanitation
description: From 2022 to 2023, Cambodia saw a total investment of $9.3 million in water and sanitation through public-private partnerships, highlighting a need for increased investment.

name: Business Entry Bottlenecks
title: Challenges in Business Entry Efficiency
description: In 2024, Cambodia scored 9 in the Operational Efficiency of Business Entry, suggesting significant barriers to starting new businesses.

name: Judicial Infrastructure Hurdles
title: Weakness in Judicial Insolvency Proceedings
description: Cambodia's score of 3.33 in 2024 for the quality of institutional and operational infrastructure for judicial insolvency proceedings indicates a need for improvement.

name: Minimal Fuel Exports
title: Negligible Fuel Export Contribution
description: Fuel exports accounted for a mere 0.00000339% of Cambodia's merchandise exports in 2022, highlighting a minimal role in the economy.

name: Asset Acquisition Deficit
title: Negative Financial Asset Acquisition
description: In 2021, Cambodia experienced a net acquisition of financial assets at -4.22 trillion LCU, indicating a significant financial outflow.
